fields.description:
[NSParagraphStyle|https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/Cocoa/Reference/ApplicationKit/Classes/NSParagraphStyle_Class/index.html#//apple_ref/occ/cl/NSParagraphStyle] support is missing from the SDK. That means that there’s no way in a single {{Ti.UI.Label}} to define paragraphs and ‘block elements’ (a-la Web’s Box Model).

This can be somehow worked around using multiple labels inside a View with {{layout=vertical}}, but this workaround is not applicable in {{ListView}} templates and {{ListDataItem}} protocol, where repeatable elements and/or dynamic views are not supported.
